title: Stolen Soul
description: Stolen Soul is an Immortal Choice Series short story that details how Aiden, formerly Aodhan, was turned into a vampire against his will and the direct edict of Hades. Learn how the man we meet and learn to love in Birth of the Nyxian became the man he is today. Set in 1200s Ireland, learn about the torture Aodhan had to endure at the hands of Soraya before he was able to escape her grasp.man he is now.
author: Amanda R. Browning
